p: In search of the anti-COVID-19 compound, we selected 145 phyto-compounds from Kabasura kudineer, a poly-herbal formulation prescribed in AYUSH for COVID-19 which are effective against flu, cough, sore throat, shortness of breath (similar to SARS-CoV2 like symptoms). [AYUSH Ministry of Health Corona Advisory—D.O. No. S. 16030/18/2019—NAM; 06th March 2020]. Therefore, the present study involves the analysis of 145 phytocompounds from Kabasura kudineer against the structure of SARS-CoV-2 3CL pro through structure-based in silico molecular docking and to identify potent anti-COVID-19 natural compounds.
